<style type="text/css">
                html
				{
                    width: __UP_rdW__px;
                    height: __UP_rdH__px;
                }
				body, app-root
				{
					background: transparent;
					width: __UP_rdW__px;
					height: __UP_rdH__px;
					overflow: hidden;
					background-color: #__UP_BackColor__;
				}
            </style>
			<link rel="stylesheet" href="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-text-app/styles.4fd3f7aba87e798cd276.css">
            <body>
            	<app-root></app-root>
		
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-text-app/runtime-es2015.ec85f614fb027b3060f0.js" type="module"></script>
				<script src="https://reveldigital.github.io/reveldigital-gadgets/apps/ng-text-app/runtime-es5.ec85f614fb027b3060f0.js" nomodule defer></script>

				<script type="text/javascript">

					var prefs = new gadgets.Prefs();
					
					
					function load() {
					
						WebFont.load({
							google: {
								families: [ gadgets.reveldigital.getFamilyName(prefs.getString("style")) ]
							}
						});
					}
					gadgets.util.registerOnLoadHandler(load);
					
				</script>
